Package planes can be created from packages
... and can be automated using a deployer
An ejector is needed to launch planes
Planes can also be launched by hand with right-click while holding the plane
cmpackagecouriers.ponder.receiving_plane: Planes will deliver to the player with their name matching to the package address
The plane will skip unloaded chunks and can traverse through other dimensions
Planes can also deliver to depots with signs matching the package address
Destinations have to be chunkloaded for this to work
If there are no available targets, the plane will be ejected as an item as usual
item.cmpackagecouriers.portable_stock_ti: When sneak clicked on a Stock Link or Stock Ticker
Portable Stock Ticker will bind to the Network
Portable Stock Ticker will open a mobile Stock Keeper menu
